description.value:
Also at 1st tier, your starship's firepower can overwhelm larger ships.

When a crew member deals damage to a Large or larger ship with a ship weapon, the crew member can increase the damage by rolling a Superior Firepower die, which is a [[/r 1d4]], and add it to the damage roll (no action required).

Your ship's Superior Firepower die changes when it reaches certain tiers. The die becomes a [[/r 1d6]] at 2nd tier, a [[/r 1d8]] at 3rd tier, a [[/r 1d10]] at 4th tier, and a [[/r 1d12]] at 5th tier.

This feature can be used a number of times equal to 3 x your ship's tier. All expended uses are regained when the ship undergoes recharging.

activation.condition: When a crew member deals damage to a Large or larger ship with a ship weapon
